data: imap 25 SERVER_SMTP #smtp server used in mail account. smtp-mail.outlook.com for outlook SERVER_POP #pop server used in mail account. pop-mail.outlook.com for outlook SERVER_IMAP #imap server used in mail account. imap-mail.outlook.com for outlook login@toto.fr #email adress. firstname.name@epitech.eu for epitech mail adress. passwd #password of the account folder #specify the folder in whitch we want to display the mails
